title: Charley Harper Provocative Plumage Coir Doormat
description:
Known for his playfulness and graphic genius, Charley Harper captured Birds-of-Paradise in a moment of lighthearted courtship, grandiose feathers on full display. Made of eco-friendly coir, a natural way to clean both shoes and paws alike. Anti-slip rubber backing helps keep the mat secure.

  • Dimensions: 36 x 24 in.

Additional Shipping $15 per Order.

This item cannot be shipped to a destination outside the United States.
